work.name: Department of Physics and Astronomy, University of Pittsburgh

awards.title: Dietrich School of Arts and Sciences Pre-Doctoral Fellowship
awards.awarder: Dept. of Physics & Astronomy, University of Pittsburgh
awards.summary: Graduate programs include Arts and Sciences Fellowships in funding packages to recruit doctoral students of exceptional ability and promise, either for their first year in the Ph.D. program or for later years.

awards.title: Thomas-Lain Fund Scholarship
awards.awarder: Dept. of Physics & Astronomy, University of Pittsburgh

awards.title: Leo B. and Teresa Y. Wegemer Endowed STEM Fellowship
awards.awarder: Dept. of Physics & Astronomy, University of Pittsburgh
awards.summary: Established to support students of exceptional promise in their pursuit of high impact scientific research. Fellowship grants will be awarded to support the research of two exceptional, current, full-time students who are pursuing a Ph.D. degree in Dietrich School of Arts and Sciences STEM fields.

awards.title: SB3C Student Paper and Presentation PhD Competition -- 1st place
awards.summary: Qualified to a finals competition after having abstract selected from over 200 other applicants. Presented an oral presentation in the final round at the 2023 SB3 Conference in Vail, Colorado. Won 1st place in topic group (Section VI: Emerging Tissue Mechanobiology & Biomechanics II).

awards.title: SACNAS NDiSTEM Travel Scholarship
awards.awarder: Society for the Advancement of Chicano and Native American Students

engagements.title: QBio Conference
engagements.venue: Colorado State University -- Fort Collins, Colorado
engagements.summary: Presented a poster: 'Autologous Chemotaxis at High Cell Density'.

engagements.title: Stochastic Physics in Biology -- Gordon Research Conference
engagements.venue: Four Points Sheraton / Holiday Inn Express -- Ventura, California
engagements.summary: Presented a poster: 'Autologous Chemotaxis at High Cell Density'.

engagements.title: March Meeting -- American Physical Society
engagements.summary: Presented a talk: 'Collective Effects in Flow Driven Cancer Cell Migration'.

engagements.title: Summer Biomechanics, Bioengineering, and Biotransport Conference -- Student Paper and Presentation PhD Competition
engagements.summary: Presented a talk as part of the Student Paper and Presentation PhD Competition: 'Collective Effects in Flow Driven Cell Migration'. Received 1st Place.

engagements.title: QBio Conference -- Chinese Academy of Sciences
engagements.venue: Shenzhen Institute of Arts and Technology -- Shenzhen, China
engagements.summary: Presented a talk: 'Collective Effects in Flow Driven Cell Migration'.
